plot outline: Anuradha is a naive but beautiful girl in her late 20s. Originally from Satara, she now lives alone in Mumbai and works for a marketing company. She is in a relationship with an ambitious lawyer, Shantanu. In a mysterious turn of events, a doppelganger commits murders and Anuradha gets dragged in as the prime suspect. Is Anuradha really the "man-eater" people consider her to be?
title: Anuradha
plot: _Anuradha_ (qv) is a naive but beautiful girl in her late 20s. Originally from Satara, she now lives alone in Mumbai and works for a marketing company. She is in a relationship with an ambitious lawyer, Shantanu. In a mysterious turn of events, a doppelganger commits murders and _Anuradha_ (qv) gets dragged in as the prime suspect. Is _Anuradha_ (qv) really the "man-eater" people consider her to be?
